SQL.FetchAccountSQL: SELECT DISTINCT ia.id, ia.company_id, sc.name as company_name, ia.account_code, ia.username, ia.password, ia.display_name, ia.mobile, ia.telephone, ia.email, ia.rm, ia.msn, ia.qq, ia.address, ia.account_type, ia.is_forbidden, ia.create_time, ia.modify_time, ia.create_by, ia.modify_by, ia.status, ia.dept, ia.title, ia.valid_time, ia.info_status, iarr.role_id FROM idb_account ia INNER JOIN sys_company sc ON ia.company_id = sc.id AND sc.status = '1' INNER JOIN idb_account_role_relation iarr ON ia.id = iarr.account_id AND iarr.status = '1' INNER JOIN idb_department d ON d.id = iarr.department_id AND d.status = '1' WHERE d.department_code = 'BOND' AND ia.status = '1'
